we hope you have a splendid bank holiday .
the team will be back with you on tuesday at 08:00 .

documents.title: busy bank holiday traffic
text: it 's a busy bank holiday getaway friday already .
it 's really heavy on the a34 northbound from the marcham interchange to the m40 junction 9 .
the a34 's slow southbound from marcham to milton in the roadworks area .
there 's severe congestion westbound from oxford out to witney , and stagecoach are reporting delays of half an hour to the s2 witney service .
author: Sara Dumbell
Travel presenter, BBC Radio Oxford

documents.title: teenagers arrested after robbery
text: two teenage boys have been arrested after a man was
the 22-year-old victim was walking away from the station on hythe bridge street at about 17:40 on sunday when he was pushed into the road by two boys and punched .
they also stole his iphone .
the boys , who are 17 and 15 and both from abingdon , have been arrested on sus of robbery and are on police bail .

documents.title: 'disproportionate rise '
text: councillors have been commenting on the recent hike in their allowances following yesterday 's council meeting .
conservative ward member for sonning common , paul harrison , said the rise was needed to bring the council in line with south oxfordshire 's partner council , vale of white horse .
he said : `` it came down so we were the lowest paid district council in the country - we are still in the low end .
effectively they are trying to rebalance it with our neighbouring council as we are using the same offices . ''
labour ward member for didcot south , margaret davies , was the only councillor to vote against the enriched allowance .
she said : `` i think it 's too great an increase .
i did support the independent remuneration panel recommendation because it had been eight years since there has been an increase , but a 58 % increase is disproportionate , it 's too much . ''
author: Roz Tappenden
BBC South

documents.title: deranged marriage comes to oxford
text: the 10th anniversary tour of the deranged marriage comes to the
the play takes an irreverent look at british asian wedding traditions , and is written and directed by pravesh kumar , the artistic director of the award-winning

documents.title: councillors vote to increase allowances
text: councillors in south oxfordshire have voted to increase their allowances by nearly 58 % , £ 1,000 more a year than was recommended by an independent panel .
the increase , from £ 2,900 a year to £ 4,575 , was agreed at a full council meeting on thursday evening .
an independent remuneration panel report recommended the basic allowance was increased to £ 3,500 .
the amount has not increased since 2007 , before the number of district councillors was reduced from 48 to 36 .
author: Roz Tappenden
BBC South

documents.title: boating death - update
text: we 've learned it was a woman in her 60s who died in a boating accident on the river thames in oxfordshire .
she was rescued from the water downstream of cleeve lock near streatley on monday afternoon .
she 'd fallen in after her boat had come through the lock .
she was taken to the john radcliffe hospital in oxford but died that evening .
thames valley police said it was treating her death as unexplained , but not sus
author: Sue Kinnear
Newsreader, BBC Radio Oxford

documents.title: puppy love
text: the fifth event , which will raise money for dogs for the disabled , is showcasing another cornucopia of magnificent mutts at the orangery from 10:00 .
the judges will deliberate on categories including young handler , golden oldie , best puppy , best trick , and waggiest tail .
author: Dave Gilyeat
BBC News

documents.title: boating death investigated by police
text: we 're looking into reports of a fatal boating accident on the river thames in oxfordshire .
it has been revealed by the
waterways manager andrew graham said the authority was assisting the police in the matter .
`` we offer our condolences to the family involved in the incident , '' he added .
author: Dave Gilyeat
BBC News

documents.title: golden boot winner
text: the 25-year-old will decide in the next couple of weeks whether he 's staying at didcot , but he credits the club 's management team for helping him become so prolific .
`` clubs have been calling and texting but i 'm going to go away and have a think , '' he added .
author: Robyn Cowen
Sports reporter, BBC Radio Oxford

documents.title: new homes 'would obstruct church '
text: cherwell district council has said it
the village has had more than 180 new homes approved since january 2014 .

the council said concerns had been raised that the development of 98 homes , west of banbury road , would `` harm the rural area by breaching the urban limits of the village and obstructing views of the grade i-listed church of st mary '' .
author: Roz Tappenden
BBC South

documents.title: play celebrates 150 years of learning
text: oxford brookes is
the institution began as the oxford school of art , with classes taught at a room in the taylor institution , on 22 may , 1865 .
the play will be performed by the
vice chancellor alistair fitt said the event marked a `` significant day in oxford brookes ' history '' .
author: Dave Gilyeat
BBC News

documents.title: flower rescue
text: wild flowers have been rescued from the crumbling site of the old bicester community hospital
author: Oxford Times

documents.title: adderbury homes refused
text: councillors have turned down an application for a development of 98 homes in adderbury .

michael gibbard , lead member for planning , said : `` we do not consider this to be a suitable site as it would not only cause significant harm to the character of the area by developing open countryside but would result in the village losing yet another field to housing . ''
author: Dave Gilyeat
BBC News

documents.title: elizabethan song contest ?
text: recognise this actress under the elizabeth i make up ?
it 's former eastender anita dobson , and she 'll be speaking to me about her new role in a bbc documentary about the virgin queen .
plus , the eurovision song contest is tomorrow and i 'm excited !
garry holland from didcot will preview the show with us - he 's published a book about his repeated failures trying to enter songs into the competition .
author: Kat Orman
Mid-morning presenter, BBC Radio Oxford

documents.title: the oxford experience
text: oxford university has released a `` handy infographic '' giving some
the number-crunching includes the fact that the institution is home to 44 colleges and halls , has students from 140 countries and more than 100 libraries .
the university also proudly states that it is the oldest in the english-speaking world , pre-dating the aztec empire , the magna carta and ghengis khan !
distinguished alumni include tim berners-lee , stephen hawking and hugh grant .

documents.title: church 's new look
text: an historic village church
author: Banbury Guardian

documents.title: what 's all the 'fusc ' ?
text: we shall find out tonight if oxford university students have voted to
at the moment , students and examiners have to wear a gown over an outfit known as a `` sub fusc '' .
the compulsory clothing includes a dark suit , black shoes , a plain white shirt or blouse with a bow tie , long tie or ribbon .
whilst some students enjoy their `` unique '' appearance , others have described the tradition as `` elitist '' .
the results of the referendum are in at 20:00 .
which way do you think the decision should go ?
author: Dave Gilyeat
BBC News

documents.title: magnox announces job losses
text: magnox has said it plans to cut up to 1,600 jobs
the company , which runs a site in harwell , says the cuts will include staff , agency and contract roles .
the unite trade union said the news was `` shocking '' and the move would lead to `` a loss of vital skills and expertise in the nuclear industry '' .
author: Bill Wilson
Business reporter, BBC News

documents.title: broken down van
text: there 's reports of a broken down white van on the a4165 banbury road near the water eaton park and ride headed towards oxford .

Travel presenter, BBC Radio Oxford

documents.title: 'chance of showers '
text: after a dry start for some of us we will see more in the way of cloud and the chance of a few spots of rain and some misty conditions up over the hills .
brighter spells will develop at times this afternoon , but there 's the chance of the odd shower .
the winds will remain light and temperatures may even reach 20c ( 68f ) .
author: Kawser Quamer
Presenter, BBC Weather
